name: CALIFORNIA BEAR DIE-CUT Griptape 9x33
description:
YOU LUCKY DEVIL! You are about to get some grip for 5 BUCKS with FREE SHIPPING for a limited time only. This is our initial offer to get as many as you skaters to get your hands on some Animal Grip. Every order of grip comes with 2 free Animal Grip logo stickers as well.

This is the most recognizable California Bear die-cut design, lower left-hand side of the grip. The sheet comes with a perforated Cali Bear shape ready to pop out with ease. The griptape itself is a medium grade, perfect for those flip tricks you are about to get on LOCK. The grip is also perforated with holes to ensure no air bubbles occur while applying the grip. 

**CONTEST IN EFFECT**
Anyone who is lucky enough to get on this deal, be sure to follow us on instagram at @animalgrip and take a picture of you or your homie skating with animalgrip. The top 3 best pictures will get some free grip. Pictures can range from gnarly tricks to creative to making us laugh. Be sure to tag it #animalgripcontest. Good luck and enjoy! 

Skating forever,
-your homies at Animal Grip.
